channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Failed road repair over one side of the road. Various holes and damage very dangerous to cycle over it., 31st March
item.description:
On the left side of the road towards the Shurdington Road. An extensive area of broken road which is dangerous to cycle over.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 31st March
item.description:
Dear Sir/Madam I write with great urgency with reference to the temporary traffic lights just installed at the crossroads of Hyde Lane, Southam Lane and theA435 Evesham Road, these, together with three other sets nearby, have created absolute mayhem this evening to many hundreds of motorists, me amongst them, with Hyde Lane solid from top to bottom, and backing up Kingsditch Lane. I have looked at Causeway one network which I think would be a waste of time contacting, as something needs to be done about this NOW, especially as the disruption looks set to continue until October, this is just not acceptable, particularly as no alternative routes are available to us travelling locally to work, schools etc. etc. Another irritation is the 100% lack of information to motorists, will this end in 1 day, 2 days, or, as this suggests, the end of October!!!!!!! That is TOTALLY unacceptable, and must be rectified immediately, no excuses
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Due to continued erosion, the edge of the road is collapsing, we get at least 1 van a week that goes over the edge and requires recovery, 31st March
item.description:
Drainage between West Ridge and Maps Acre, opposite Kerrs Hill

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes outside 108 fairview rd, 31st March
item.description:
Despite having been reported TWICE, and the status has been changed to 'repaired' the potholes are STILL there!! PLease repair them!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Fairview Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
